name: material-dp

tableSchemas.name: material-entity
tableSchemas.title: MaterialEntity
tableSchemas.description: A material manifestation of an entity.

tableSchemas.name: gathering-event
tableSchemas.title: GatheringEvent
tableSchemas.description: A type of Event during which Material and/or Digital Entities are gathered. The eventType is implicit.

tableSchemas.name: identification
tableSchemas.title: Identification
tableSchemas.description: A taxonomic determination (e.g., the assignment to a taxon).

tableSchemas.name: agent
tableSchemas.title: Agent
tableSchemas.description: An agent is something that bears some form of responsibility for an activity taking place, for the existence of an entity, or for another agent's activity (https://www.w3.org/TR/prov-o/#Agent).

tableSchemas.name: digital-entity
tableSchemas.title: DigitalEntity
tableSchemas.description: A digital manifestation of an entity.

tableSchemas.name: agent-identifier
tableSchemas.title: AgentIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An alternate identifier for an Agent

tableSchemas.name: material-entity-identifier
tableSchemas.title: MaterialEntityIdentifier
tableSchemas.description: An alternate identifier for a MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: digital-entity-assertion
tableSchemas.title: DigitalEntityAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a DigitalEntity.

tableSchemas.name: material-entity-assertion
tableSchemas.title: MaterialEntityAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a MaterialEntity.

tableSchemas.name: gathering-event-assertion
tableSchemas.title: GatheringEventAssertion
tableSchemas.description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a GatheringEvent.

tableSchemas.name: material-entity-citation
tableSchemas.title: MaterialEntityCitation
tableSchemas.description: A record of citation against a material entity.

title: Darwin Core Material Data Package (Material DP)
description: A data package for Material focused datasets
